nextSession.title: Chapter 47 - The Final Showdown
nextSession.description: Madam Eva's card reading into fruition. It is time to smite the wretched king of Barovia, Strahd von Zarovich.

events.value: Firewatch's nightmares from the Mystery Mine will fade.

nextSession.title: Chapter 23 - Talking with Zybilna
nextSession.description: You made a deal with Bavlorna. The Bullywugs have returned with the BBBB and the taxidermy. Now it is time to exchange these things for a heart, a head, and a conversation with Zybilna.
